p: Obesity is a cardiometabolic risk factor that adversely affects serum lipids by increasing TG levels and decreasing HDL-C levels [ 26]. The consumption of a high-fat diet, which could facilitate the development of a positive energy balance and lead to an increase in visceral fat deposition, is considered a major risk factor for obesity [ 26, 27]. It has been reported that some components in garlic and onion are known to be effective in the treatment of obesity and hyperlipidemia [ 28â€“ 30].
